entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
